name: FIRED (Eventy)
description:
Ooops! Scratch Cat now works at a local store, but guess what? He got fired cuz he was nasty!

Go search the rarest game ever or the boss firin' you!

(THIS IS A PROTOTYPE AND ONLY HAS THE FIRST SCENE)

The game can be translated automatically by going into the language tab at the start, pressing J and typing in a language (WARNING! It must be not an abbreviation and must be written in its English name, example: if you are using Japanese, write Japanese and not 日本
